name: Hamster & Energy Tycoon
description:
The local nuclear power plant is malfunctioning. Therefore you take the initiative and try to supply the whole city yourself.
But beware! The power plant workers aren't sitting around without fixing the problem aswell. Also there might be another critical problem with the reactor...?

Earn more money and be the first one to supply the entire city!

Credits:

Group Leader:   Benjamin Schmidt

Programming:   Benjamin Schmidt, Pi-Jay
